entry.title: Crystal - Lactose Free Non Hydrogenated Margarine - 907 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crystal
Type: FOOD
Price: 4.99

Crystal - Soft Non Hydrogenated MargarineÂ  - 2 Lbs

  • No trans fat
  • Lactose-free
  • Vegan
  • Non-hydrogenated
  • No artificial flavors
  • Source of omega-3 fatty acids
  • 907g
  • Keep refrigerated

Create a delicious cake that disappears quickly and other delectable treats with this trans free solid margarine. It adds a creamy butter-like flavor to dishes, but contains no cholesterol unlike traditional butter. This margarine is perfect for baking fresh treats to perfection. Plus, it also is an excellent flavor enhancer in sauces, soups, and gravies or use it as a spread. It features the same rich butter flavor your customers know and love at a more economical price. Use it to create delectable and savory dishes that keep your customers coming back for more!

With subtle flavour and a soft consistency, Crystal Margarine is formulated to be directly spreadable from refrigerated temperatures and is ideal for most cooking applications. Made from non-hydrogenated vegetable oil and canola oil, our products are vegan, gluten-free, lactose-free and are an excellent source of omega-3 fatty acids.

We proudly use environmentally friendly packaging. Our Crystal Margarine containers are reusable, dishwasher, and microwave safe.

entry.title: Pure Leaf - Chamomile Herbal Tea Bags - 20 / Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pure Leaf
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 10.99

Details

Enjoy the premium taste and aroma of loose leaf tea blends in convenient, single-serve packaging with this Pure Leaf chamomile herbal tea bag! Made with 100% whole chamomile flower heads, this herbal tea delivers a delicate, buttery, floral flavor with a golden color and sweet, honey-like aroma. To prepare, simply steep one pyramid bag at 176 degrees Fahrenheit for 2-3 minutes. It is naturally-caffeine free, so it can be enjoyed any time of the day or night, and may help promote relaxation and sleep. This herbal tea is perfect for upscaling your waiting room, break room, or lobby's offerings, or merchandising as a beverage selection at your breakfast buffet or in your cafe. You can also pair with other Pure Leaf tea bag flavors to offer as a thoughtful in-room amenity for guests staying at your hotel.

The herbal tea sachet's pyramid shape and mesh design allows water to circulate around the flowers more easily than with traditional tea bags. This allows the flowers to expand, which draws out more of the flavors, fragrance, and color for a more well-rounded cup. Plus, the tea bag, strings, and tags are made with compostable, plant-based renewable materials and the cases, cartons, and envelopes are 100% recyclable.

  • Enveloped herbal hot tea
  • Naturally caffeine free
  • Made from chamomile flowers
  • Picked, dried, and crafted
  • Smooth, sweet floral taste
  • Renewable and compostable bags, strings, and tags
  • Packaged in recyclable envelopes and cartons
  • Vegetarian
  • Vegan
  • OU Kosher certified
  • 20 tea bags per pack

Pure Leaf - Chamomile Tea - 20 / Pack

entry.title: Monin - Lemon Tea Concentrate Syrup - 750 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Monin
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 9.99

Quickly and easily make popular iced tea drinks with this Monin lemon tea concentrate!

Featuring notes of crisp, tart lemon, and sweet black tea, this concentrate offers the perfect way to create delicious, well balanced lemon iced tea beverages in your diner, bakery, hotel, or office. Packaged in a glass bottle, this concentrate boasts a sleek appearance for an attractive shelf presence and can easily be paired with a compatible pump for quick, efficient service during peak serving hours.

Easy to Prepare

Simply fill a glass with ice, and mix 1 oz. concentrate with 7 oz. water. Stir well and you're ready to serve! It is conveniently pre-sweetened with pure cane sugar, making it an easy one step solution to serving quality iced tea in your establishment. Each bottle makes approximately (25) 8 oz. drinks.

Sweet and refreshing, guests are sure to love this easy-sipping beverage!

Monin - Lemon Tea Concentrate Syrup - 750 ml

entry.summary:
Vendor: Monin
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 31.99

Bring exotic citrus flavor to your beverages with this Monin premiumÂ MargaritaÂ flavoring syrup!

This syrup provides a quick and easy way to add exciting new flavor and a vibrant color to a variety of your handcrafted cocktails, sodas, iced teas, and lemonades. Made with pure cane sugar and no artificial ingredients, this all natural syrup will enhance the flavor profile of your mixed or blended drinks without overpowering them or being too sweet.
